channel.title: [Project Insanity] Keeping Items On Death (Rep++)
channel.description:
I was looking for a way that players can keep items on death as well as mods, admins, and owners. Does anyone know how to do this? I tried changing the player rights for the admins keeping items on death in config.java, but that didn't do anything.
Anyways I want it so when anyone dies, they keep the items that they are wearing and the items in their inventory.

item.title: [Project Insanity] Keeping Items On Death (Rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

@PlayerAssistant

if (c.playerRights < 2) { // c.getItems().dropAllItems(); // drop all items c.getItems().deleteAllItems(); // delete all items }

Read full topic

item.description:
@matzie wrote:

there should be something like applyDead() and if they are right-worthy, skip the dropping items part? :o
